titleStmt.title: A song of Syon of the beauty of Bethell the glory of Gods own house. By a citizen of Syon.
titleStmt.author: Citizen of Syon.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Larnar at the signe of the Bible in East-Cheap,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "One a thing beleevers hearts are fixt upon," -- "a" is superscript and refers to side note "a".
Reproduction of the originals in the British Library.
